title: Anime Realm Tier List
description: Explore our comprehensive ranking of iconic anime realms, categorized from S to C Tier. Discover what makes each world unique and how they contribute to their respective series.
heading: Anime Realm Tier List
introText: Explore our comprehensive ranking of iconic anime realms, categorized from S to C Tier. Discover what makes each world unique and how they contribute to their respective series.

data.itemDescription: Strong ground DPS. Great range. Good ATK Speed, and decent upgrade cost
Highest DPS in the Anime Realms, an extremely good option. Great range, and AoE potential
Hill Unit with a ton of range and AoE damage. Good DPS scaling into later rounds
Ground DPS with Fire elemental damage. Can inflict burn. Decent range, and overall good damage dealer
Arguably one of the best DPS Mythic units. Excels against bosses. Great DPS, Range, and gets decent AoE with upgrades
One of the best AoE units. Good range, and exceptional CC ability to stun
Strongest Support unit for any mode. Increases damage and decreases upgrade costs significantly
Jack of all trades, with scaling DPS and AoE potential. Also provides decent support and stuns enemies
Great support unit, especially on Story stages. Provides extra cash with every round. Scales with upgrades
Can summon units, providing good DPS. Decent in most modes, excels in Story stages
Great for AoE, decent DPS. Range is decent and so is the scaling
Good DPS unit, with AoE potential on skill casts. Can also inflict burn debuffs when damaging
DPS is decent, with good scaling in later stages. Good range as well as AoE damage. Upgrades are expensive
Great range, and deals AoE damage. Inflicts burn buffs, great for clearing hordes. Can only be placed on hills
Decent DPS and range with good scaling. Also has AoE potential
Decent range, but good DPS. Great AoE on attacks, with decent scaling. Upgrades are expensive
DPS is relatively high with a good range. Upgrades are cheap. Can only be placed on hills. Outclassed by higher tiers
Cheap to upgrade. Good range, but lacks CC or debuffs. DPS is subpar, and doesn't scale too high
Provides decent support to other units. Deals AoE damage with freeze debuffs. Upgrades are expensive. Better support units are available
Decent Range, along with AoE attacks. Inflicts slow debuff on attacking. Expensive to upgrade. DPS is subpar
Good lighting type DPS. Great AoE range, especially after upgrades. Slow attack speed. Not good against bosses
Overall decent AoE attacks, but short range. Weakest Legendary, subpar DPS. Outclasses by every other Legendary
Decent DPS in comparison to other Epic units. AoE has a short range. Needs proper placement to be useful
AoE and Range is decent. Damage is very low, with not much scaling
Decent support unit increases the damage of nearby units. Can't be sold after placed. Support range is relatively short. Not worth it most of the time
DPS is decent, and scales into later stages. Almost no AoE and slow ATK speed. Upgrades are expensive
DPS is arguably the highest DPS among Rare units. Attacks have some AoE. Doesn't scale well in later stages
Lowest DPS and range among Epic units. Upgrades are not worth the cost. AoE is also weaker
DPS is subpar. AoE is almost nonexistent. Negligible scaling with upgrades
Decent range, but lacks DPS. Can only be placed on hills
Decent DPS, but extremely slow ATK Speed. Can only be placed on hills
Subpar DPS, range, and AoE. Doesn't scale well
Good DPS in comparison to other Rares. Can inflict slow. Lacks AoE, and stats don't scale much
